context.p: You can download one or more documents:

step.cmd: Click the Dashboard tool in the toolbar.
Select the folder you want to download from.
Select the document(s) you want to download.

taskbody.result: The file is saved to your download folder. If you selected multiple files, a zip file is saved to your download folder.The maximum download size for multiple files is 4 GB. There is no maximum download file size for a single file.
